trends: There have been 2 other sightings in North Smithfield
There were no other sightings in North Smithfield on or around January 17th 2003
divs: Sighting Detailsmid jan. i was driving home after work around1145 pm on grange rd in nsmithfield, ri when i saw a giant glowing rough edged ball almost hovering inthe distance to my left, i watched while i drove. about a half mile down the rdi could still see it through the trees, ehen i got to the football field at thehigh school i noticed it getting closer i stopped and got out and watched goover very slowly. i almost freaked out. i almost reported to police. ilost theobject in the trees. about 3 weeks later i had forgotten about it, but aroundthe same time on a sunday i was bringing my girlfriend home and i saw it again.we both got out of the car and watched it. i saw your ad on public access theother day. so i figured i should tell someone.
